title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: ajc should support the -d option to specify the output directory for compiled classes.
EB: But it will be nice to have the same behavior as javac, where the -d option specifies the output directory for compiled classes.
SR: Implement support for the -d option in ajc when compiling classes from a subpackage.
